_header: Jesu do me love Thee so
_description: Rubric heading to Latin prose text of The Fifteen O’s of St. Bridget — four lines, monorhymed

BodLatLitE47.Transcription:
Ihesu doo me low the soo were I be or wath I dooffor lyfe or
                    detȝ for wyl or wooThat my hert turnyth the nowth froo
BodLatLitE47.Editions:
Wordsworth,  Christopher,
                        ed.  
             Horae Eboracenses.
Surtees Society
         132 (1920): 76-80.
